hints.content: Each tick mark on the number line represents one minute.

$10{:}55$ is $55$ minutes after $10{:}00$. 

![The number line goes from 0 to 60 with marks at every 10 minutes. 0 is labeled 10:00 and 60 is labeled 11:00. Marks divide the space between each number into 10 equal parts. The mark at 55 is labeled 10:55.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/dc6b31a5fc3964b73362cfec505346cc126bb49a) 

So, we move $55$ tick marks past $10{:}00$.

This number line shows $10{:}55$ graphed:

![The number line goes from 0 to 60 with marks at every 10 minutes. 0 is labeled 10:00 and 60 is labeled 11:00. Marks divide the space between each number into 10 equal parts. Point A is labeled at the fifth mark to the right of 50.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/480bf5ecce2d7b9448f851ccecd8a47372aec56d)

question.content:
**On which number line is $10{:}55$ graphed?**
